thread.title: Here’s The One-Sentence Cure To Your Dating Problems, Based On Your Zodiac Sign
thread.title_full: Here’s The One-Sentence Cure To Your Dating Problems, Based On Your Zodiac Sign

author: Stacey Fregoso
title: Here’s The One-Sentence Cure To Your Dating Problems, Based On Your Zodiac Sign
text:
God & Man Aries: Know when to let your guard down, and trust.
Taurus: Drop the ego, and let people love you with everything.
Gemini: Love the person you want to love. Not the person who looks good for your image.
Cancer: It’s okay to need someone instead of being needed.
Leo: Be content with the things. It’s not always gonna be perfect.
Virgo: Stop looking for perfection. Nobody is.
Libra: Not everything is a fairytale, and honeymoon phase doesn’t last forever.
Scorpio: Let yourself love. You need it.
Sagittarius: When things get low don’t just give up there is always more highs.
Capricorn: Stop with the trust issues — not everybody is the same.
Aquarius: Things aren’t just about you. Let them talk about them too.
Pisces: Stop taking everything so serious, and have some fun.
